price: 57. Ama koros Yallah say xaylo haytaah kaah taaxige malayka kay say xaylo axcuk, Yalli usun diraabaay deedalah kaal haanamak saytunnooweh, usun sinni nafsih lab xayloy yikcineeni haysiteeniih sinnih yeexegen.
arabic: وَيَجۡعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡبَنَٰتِ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَلَهُم مَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayajʿalūna lillahi al-banāti sub'ḥānahu walahum mā yashtahūna
